attributes.action: Help the homeless in society such as veterans. Over 5,000 sleep on the streets.
attributes.additional_details: We need to help those with PTSD and also those found with no home. A government scheme needs to be set up. To help those abroad , in similar situations, we must first help those at home.
attributes.background: Every night roughly 5,000 Veterans, who fought to protect our country and the people of resident, sleep without a home each night. I would ask the government to please put money into protecting these people and helping them get back on there feet.
